abstract: An acquaintance unfriends Saul Hansell on Facebook and asks him to meet on more neutral ground: LinkedIn. What is friendship in the modern world.
snippet: An acquaintance unfriends Saul Hansell on Facebook and asks him to meet on more neutral ground: LinkedIn. What is friendship in the modern world.
lead_paragraph: I found this message in my Facebook inbox yesterday.

headline.main: He Didn’t Want To Be That Kind of Friend
